title: Interactive Design Dashboard
description: A modern dashboard for managing design projects with real-time collaboration features.
longDescription: Built a comprehensive design dashboard that enables teams to collaborate on design projects in real-time. Features include project management, file uploads, version control, and team messaging.

title: Retro Synthwave Portfolio
description: A nostalgic portfolio website inspired by 80s synthwave aesthetic with animated elements.
longDescription: Created a visually striking portfolio using retro synthwave design principles with smooth animations and interactive elements. Focused on creating an immersive user experience with attention to typography and color theory.

title: E-Commerce Platform
description: Full-stack e-commerce solution with product catalog, shopping cart, and payment integration.
longDescription: Developed a complete e-commerce platform from scratch with features including product catalog, user authentication, shopping cart management, and secure payment processing.
